bio: I am a Software Consultant at TNG Technology Consulting living in London, UK ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§. I recently handed in my PhD thesis under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Markus Diesmann and Prof. Dr. Sacha J. van Albada at IAS-6, Research Center JÃ¼lich. During my time as a PhD student, I worked to further our understanding of how the spatial connectivity structure of visual brain areas leads to efficient computations such as object detection. To this end, I constructed and simulated large-scale biologically realistic neural networks of early visual areas constrained by anatomical and physiological data.
